values: Gospel Depths: Why God Revealed the Depths of Salvation in Eternity PastGospel Depths: Why God Revealed the Depths of Salvation in Eternity Past

The only reason any of us know God is because he chose us before the foundation of the world. Nothing we’ve done can earn our way to him — it’s all grace.The only reason any of us know God is because he chose us before the foundation of the world. Nothing we’ve done can earn our way to him — it’s all grace.
